examples.translation: 我今天需要他－－我们需要人人都到齐。
examples.last: him today we need everybody here.

examples.translation: 旅馆工作人员对我们照顾得无微不至，尽量让我们住得舒适，
examples.last: no pains to ensure that our stay was as enjoyable as possible.

n: an extra component of a machine or other apparatus
an extra car wheel and tire for a four-wheel vehicle
a score in tenpins; knocking down all ten after rolling two balls
adj: more than is needed, desired, or required
not taken up by scheduled activities
v: save or relieve from an experience or action
give up what is not strictly needed

adj: 多余的, 闲置的, 备用的, 简陋的
